title: The Santa Class
description: Kate North, the owner of a struggling Santa School, and her instructor, Dan, must help an amnesia-stricken Santa Claus regain his memories to save Christmas and hopefully her school as well.

title: Get Him Back for Christmas
description: Follows Bella, a successful singer who returns home after a breakup with her singing partner, and in the meantime, asks Jack to help her write a song to win her ex back.
